subsection.p: This command assumes that ReferenceSequence instances do not exist already exist. Multithreading is used to more quickly persist the data.

subsection.name: Filtering
subsection.p: There are a number of filtering strategies used:
Here, the command is filtering out ReferenceSequence instances that do not:

ul.li: have a primary or alternate assembly
have the protein accession prefix of "NP_"
have the rna nucleotide accession prefix of "NM_" or "NR_"
